Economics and Finance                                                                                         Cultures & Contexts                   The content in these courses are being shared under a Creative Commons license of Attribution (BY), Non-Commercial (NC), Share-Alike (SA) . For further details, please see our Terms of Use page.                   Fair Use    Based on the Code of Best Practices in Fair Use for OpenCourseWare , NYU is sharing some of the content in these courses under "Fair Use", as provided for by 17 U.S.C. § 107 . Because "Fair Use" content may involve the copyrights or other intellectual property rights of third parties, such content is excluded from NYU's Creative Commons license (described above). When possible, NYU has provided relevant rights information.  Learn how to notify us here »                      Closed Captions & Translation   As the pilot grows, we will be providing English closed captions for our lecture videos. If you are interested in reviewing the American Literature I recordings with English closed captions or with closed captions translated into a choice of other languages, please visit the NYU YouTube channel .            Infringement Notification    If you are the copyright owner, or a individual authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner, and you believe that we have published material that infringes your copyright, we will address your concerns. Read more ....
